advantages.name: Accurate Attack
advantages.effect: Trade effect DC for attack bonus.

advantages.name: All-out Attack
advantages.effect: Trade active defense for attack bonus.

advantages.name: Assessment
advantages.effect: Use Insight to learn an opponent's combat capabilities.

advantages.name: Attractive
advantages.effect: Circumstance bonus to interaction based on your looks.

advantages.name: Benefit
advantages.effect: Gain a significant perquisite or fringe benefit.

advantages.name: Close Attack
advantages.effect: +1 bonus to close attack checks per rank.

advantages.name: Connected
advantages.effect: Call in assistance or favors with a Persuasion check.

advantages.name: Contacts
advantages.effect: Make an initial Investigation check in one minute.

advantages.name: Defensive Attack
advantages.effect: Trade attack bonus for active defense bonus.

advantages.name: Eidetic Memory
advantages.effect: Total recall, +5 circumstance bonus to remember things.

advantages.name: Evasion
advantages.effect: Circumstance bonus to avoid area effects.

advantages.name: Favored Environment
advantages.effect: Circumstance bonus to attack or defense in an environment.

advantages.name: Improved Aim
advantages.effect: Double circumstance bonuses for aiming.

advantages.name: Improved Critical
advantages.effect: +1 to critical threat range with an attack per rank.
advantages.description: For Override Repulsors: Blast 20, Plasma Bolts: Blast 15, Repulsor Rays: Blast 14, Unibeam: Cone Area Blast 14

advantages.name: Improved Defense
advantages.effect: +2 bonus to active defense when you take the defend action.

advantages.name: Improved Disarm
advantages.effect: No penalty for the disarm action.

advantages.name: Improved Initiative
advantages.effect: +4 bonus to initiative checks per rank.

advantages.name: Improved Smash
advantages.effect: No penalty for the smash action.

advantages.name: Improved Trip
advantages.effect: No penalty for the trip action.

advantages.name: Inventor
advantages.effect: Use Technology to create temporary devices.

advantages.name: Jack-of-All-Trades
advantages.effect: Use any skill untrained.

advantages.name: Leadership
advantages.effect: Spend a hero point to remove a condition from an ally.

advantages.name: Luck
advantages.effect: Re-roll a die once per rank.

advantages.name: Move-by Action
advantages.effect: Move both before and after your standard action.

advantages.name: Power Attack
advantages.effect: Trade attack bonus for effect bonus.

advantages.name: Precise Attack
advantages.effect: Ignore attack check penalties for either cover or concealment.

advantages.name: Ranged Attack
advantages.effect: +1 bonus to ranged attack checks per rank.

advantages.name: Seize Initiative
advantages.effect: Spend a hero point to go first in the initiative order.

advantages.name: Takedown
advantages.effect: Free extra attack when you incapacitate a minion.

advantages.name: Tracking
advantages.effect: Use Perception to follow tracks.

advantages.name: Well-Informed
advantages.effect: Immediate Investigation or Persuasion check to know something.

subpowers.name: Cloaking System
subpowers.effectDescription: You can vanish from sight at will.  Created Power: Visual Concealment

subpowers.name: ECM
subpowers.description: Other Sense Type: Electronic Senses; Limited to Machines
subpowers.effectDescription: You gain total concealment from a particular sense while this effect is active.

subpowers.name: Energy Absorption
subpowers.description: Absorbs: Energy, Boost: Blast; Unreliable (5 uses)

subpowers.name: Enhanced Stamina
subpowers.effectDescription: You can temporarily improve one of your existing traits.

subpowers.name: Enhanced Strength
subpowers.effectDescription: You can temporarily improve one of your existing traits.
